author: Special Correspondent
text:
M. Sumathi, Head, Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering of Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology, here has been honoured with the Senior Woman Educator and Scholar Award by the National Foundation for Entrepreneurship Development (NFED).

She has been selected for the award in recognition of her laudable contribution to teaching and scholarly activities.

She received the award during the National Women’s Day celebrations organised by NFED in Coimbatore recently. The NFED instituted the awards with the objective of empowering women and to recognise their talents and potentials in different fields.

NFED is an organisation which creates socio-economic sustenance through entrepreneurship development.

The citation presented by NFED hailed Dr. Sumathi for her commemorative services in developing the academic fraternity and research community in the field of Electronics and Communication Engineering.

Dhirajlal A. Gandhi, Chairman, Archana Manojkumar, Secretary and V. Murali Bhaskaran, Principal, DGCT felicitated Dr. Sumathi.
title: Professor honoured
